name: PopCap Essentials
description:
This compilation offers over 30 different titles from the casual experts at PopCap Games. Players can take on match-three action in Zuma, Bejeweled 3, Bejeweled Twist and Chuzzle, have fun with words in Bookworm and Bookworm Adventures, clear screens full of pegs in the pachinko-like Peggle and Peggle Nights, feed fish and battle aliens in Insaniquarium! and use anthropomorphic vegetables to battle undead monsters in Plants vs. Zombies.

All rights go to PopCap
